pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PowerProfile![Build Status](https://github.com/gisce/powerprofile/actions/workflows/python2.7-app.yml/badge.svg)![Build Status](https://github.com/gisce/powerprofile/actions/workflows/python3.11-app.yml/badge.svg)Electric Power Curve and Profiles libraryLibray to manipulate easily profiles and operate with and between them
